item.title: Service Delivery Manager Profile: Meiko Lopez
item.description:
Service Delivery Manager Profile: Meiko Lopez
Defender Experts for XDR
"Be steadfast in the truth - providing comfort and assurance to the customers that you will help them to a resolution." -Meiko Lopez, Sr. Product Manager
In the dynamic world of cybersecurity, heroes emerge to safeguard our customers’ digital realm. One such hero is Meiko Lopez, a senior product manager within Microsoft's service delivery arm for the Defender Experts for XDR service. With almost 13 years of experience at Microsoft, Meiko brings a wealth of knowledge, skills, and a unique approach to the cyb...
